description: This file initializes a knowledge base from an S3 PDF and sets up an agent to query it, specifically related to Thai recipes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: S3PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from S3 storage.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
